Event.MetaDescription: South Indian Society's 2015 Annual General Meeting. Paid only member event.
Event.Address: Church of Ascension Hall, Beaufort Road, Ealing W5 3EB
Event.Maindescription:
• To receive and consider the Trustees’ Annual Report
  • To receive, consider, approve and adopt the Treasurer’s Report and Accounts for the year ended 2014
  • Questions and Answers and discussion on the submitted reports
  • Any Other Business
  • To elect Trustees in place of retiring Trustees, as well as additional Trustees, if necessary

PAID MEMBERS ONLY EVENT
